How to Install...

Go to Start
Computer
Local Disk(C:)
Program Files (x86)
EA Games
Dead Space 2
now you can just rename the original one and then copy over the NEW one in here...or you could just Copy and paste over the old one...up to you.

Double click on the deadspace2.exe

Enjoy
